oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Forrest Monument Addendum -- Parks minutes entry
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Forrest, Nathan Bedford; Forrest monument; Forrest Park; Niehaus, Charles H.; statues; Kessler, George E.;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Entry dated November 19, 1902, in Book 1 of the Memphis Parks Commission's Minutes Book. The commission met to discuss Forrest Park using the Kessler blueprint guidelines. The plan was approved.
